meanings.definition: The quality or state of being frantic.
meanings.sent1: The franticnesses of the situation overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent2: The franticnesses of the crowd during the concert made it hard to move.
meanings.sent3: The franticnesses of the puppy trying to catch its tail was both amusing and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The franticnesses of the storm reminded him of the chaos in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The franticnesses of the race to the finish line was like a whirlwind of energy.

meanings.definition: Instances of frantic behavior or activity.
meanings.sent1: She could sense the franticnesses in the air as people rushed around.
meanings.sent2: The franticnesses of the emergency room were evident as doctors and nurses hurried to help patients.
meanings.sent3: The franticnesses of the squirrel trying to find its hidden acorn was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The franticnesses of the city streets at rush hour resembled a bustling ant colony.
meanings.sent5: The franticnesses of the children playing tag in the park filled the air with excitement.
